= Software =
[https://github.com/dgitz/icarus_drone_server ROS Server Source Code]

== Installation Instructions ==
 # Install Ubuntu 12.04
 # Install ROS Fuerte (Full version is best)
 # Install the [http://wiki.ros.org/tum_ardrone AR Drone ROS Navigation Packages]
 #
